metadata.title: CVE-2024-26581 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - high
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netfilter: nft_set_rbtree: skip end interval element from gc rbtree lazy gcon insert might collect an end interval element that has been just added inthis transactions, skip end interval elements that are not yet active.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-26581` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-105-generic - 5.15.0-105.115
linux-image-5.15.0-105-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-105.115
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-105-generic - 5.15.0-105.115
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-105-generic-64k - 5.15.0-105.115
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-28-generic - 6.5.0-28.29~22.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-28-generic - 6.5.0-28.29~22.04.1

No subscription required
